About Us

Tutelage Sdn Bhd Indonesia, PT operates as the official Indonesian branch and training representative of Tutelage Training Sdn Bhd (Malaysia). We deliver internationally aligned training programs designed to enhance safety, compliance, and workforce competency across multiple industries.

Why Choose Tutelage

  • International-standard training methodology
  • Experienced trainers from Malaysia & Indonesia
  • Online, offline, and blended learning options
  • Practical case studies based on real operations

Certification

All certificates issued represent training completion and professional development based on Tutelage Training Sdn Bhd (Malaysia) standards. Certificates are not government-issued competency certifications.
